definition: surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)

sentences.english: The second part mostly sees about Fromm's dissimilation theory.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分，着重考察弗洛姆的異化理論。

sentences.english: Fromm claims that love has been widely misunderstood.
sentences.chinese: 弗洛姆認爲，愛已經遭到了廣泛地誤解。

sentences.english: I’ve already seen an increase of wine per customer of 20 percent, ” Flom said.
sentences.chinese: “點酒的客人已經增加了20%，”弗洛姆說。
